properties.areaDesc: Port Washington to North Point Light WI; Wind Point WI to Winthrop Harbor IL; North Point Light to Wind Point WI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 2:52PM CST until February 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, heavy freezing
spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or greater expected, and may
rapidly accumulate on vessels. For the Small Craft Advisory,
north winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and waves 5 to 8
feet expected.

* WHERE...Port Washington to North Point Light WI, North Point
Light to Wind Point WI and Wind Point WI to Winthrop Harbor IL.

* WHEN...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, from 3 AM
Thursday to midnight CST Thursday night. For the Small Craft
Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of
stability. Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT
